backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing admin-gated cycle checks, CoinGecko URL builders, user profile storage, and live market data outcall helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing watchlist UI features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference and planning.
frontend/docs/coingecko-debug-dfx.md: Guide explaining how to deploy and test raw CoinGecko API responses using dfx and an admin-only debug function.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity gating, routing, actor initialization, profile setup logic, and protected views.
Dialog showing a placeholder alert indicating crypto watchlist add functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: UI entry point for the backend tester with admin checks, loading/error states, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty or placeholder file intended for configuration error handling component.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages authentication and backend-connection lifecycle with timeout handling, retry, and error UI.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Expandable debug panel showing connection diagnostics with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Placeholder or empty component file for a connection recovery dialog.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays live crypto market data with error handling and opens a detail dialog for deeper analysis.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing crypto forecast charts and adjustable settings, resetting parameters on open.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright, attribution, and disclaimer text.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Shows historical prices, moving averages, and forecasted values using regression with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Provides sliders to configure moving average period and forecast horizon for a crypto's analysis.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling theme toggling, Internet Identity auth, user registration, and optional tester navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays marketing features and prompts unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user's profile name using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Interactive command panel simulating a bash terminal with backend commands, auto-reconnect logic, and admin mode handling.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: UI card for managing a crypto watchlist, currently showing a placeholder 'coming soon' alert.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Fetches and displays live market data for a single crypto symbol with loading, error, and price-change indicators.
Renders a list of live price tick rows for selected crypto symbols or a placeholder if none are selected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, including access control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: React hook that wraps useActor and Internet Identity to provide enhanced state, timeout handling, admin init detection, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend calls such as user profiles, admin checks, user roles, and crypto market data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app in the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Admin and diagnostics page showing caller details, role, access state, and tools for backend testing with retry options.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying watchlists, live crypto data, and navigation to backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines backend tester command metadata and execution logic, including market data fetch commands for BTC/ETH with response parsing and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoHistoricalDa: Parses CoinGecko historical price responses into sorted timestamp/price pairs with error handling for malformed data.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoMarketData.t: Parses live CoinGecko market responses into structured price/change/market-cap data and provides formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, features, and architectural notes related to backend CoinGecko outcalls, mode config, and frontend integration.
